hero.title: Digital Solutions for a Connected World
hero.subtitle: CyberEco creates innovative applications that improve how people manage finances, participate in communities, and connect with each other in the digital age.

features.sectionSubtitle: Comprehensive tools for modern digital life
features.communityDesc: Build meaningful connections and collaborate with like-minded individuals in a privacy-respecting environment
features.sustainabilityDesc: Make eco-conscious choices with tools that help track and reduce your environmental impact
features.securityDesc: Your data belongs to you. Full control, transparent practices, and end-to-end encryption
features.innovationDesc: Built on open standards with community-driven development and transparent governance

mission.title: Human-Centered Technology
mission.content: CyberEco exists to empower individuals with technology that respects privacy, promotes collaboration, and enhances quality of life. We believe in creating digital tools that serve humanity, not the other way around.
mission.subtitle: Building digital tools that empower people and communities
mission.text: We believe technology should serve humanity, not exploit it. Our mission is to create digital solutions that enhance human well-being, foster authentic connections, and support sustainable living.
mission.transparencyDesc: Open development and clear data practices
mission.privacyDesc: Your data belongs to you, always
mission.communityDesc: Built by and for the people who use it

solutions.title: Solutions For Every Aspect of Life
solutions.subtitle: Explore our growing ecosystem of applications

cta.title: Ready to Join the Future of Digital Living?
